description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Windows cloud files mini filter driver related to CVE-2024-30085, Microsoft has released an update that should be applied to affected systems:

1. Download the applicable update package from the Microsoft Update Catalog. 
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
2. Install the update on your system.
3. Restart your system after installation to ensure that the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This update addresses the heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability which may allow local attackers to elevate their privileges on the affected system. It's vital to ensure that your build version corresponds to the one listed above to apply the correct patch successfully.

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm that your system is running the specified Windows version corresponding to the update being installed.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with any installation.
